content.p: This page lists selected resources for North and Latin America including sources of vacancies as well as information on living and working in particular countries. While we do not have country-specific expertise, our staff can offer advice on putting together an effective job-hunting strategy to seek work abroad. We subscribe to an international careers information package called GoinGlobal. You can access GoinGlobal free as a UoN student or graduate. GoinGlobal contains: Log in to MyCareer for access to GoinGlobal If you have any problems logging into MyCareer, please email our team. Read Ryan's blog post: One Way Ticket to Toronto Read Brydie's blog post: Top Tips to Make Your Overseas Career Dream a Reality Use these additional sources of vacancies and country guides selected by our staff for more information on job markets and opportunities abroad. Cturtle Job opportunities around the world Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) Listing of foreign embassies in the UK, and visa and travel information Jooble - Job opportunities across the world Prospects Careers resources for Brazil, Canada and the USA TARGETjobs Careers resources for Brazil, Canada, Mexico and the USA For information on teaching a range of subjects in international schools worldwide, visit our Teaching page. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
